item.description:
TOGETHER SINGLES DANCE

8:00 PM to 1 am.
The Castleton
RT.111 & RT.93 exit 3
Windham, NH 03087
www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html
Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.
Proper attire is required. No jeans, no sneakers, or work boots.
Host: Claire P
Please join me and many other friends from other meetup groups at our tables for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 400 singles, in a ballroom setting, without the ballroom dancing formality. Meet and dance with the most tasteful variety of people and ages you will find anywhere. Parking is limited to only around 250 to 300 cars. If you arrive late, please expect to walk a distance to the entrance of the hall. Also the cover charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm, so you may want to join us as as close to 8:00 pm as possible.
I hope you will join us for an evening of fun with great friends!
www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html
item.name: Together Singles Dance
